about.subtitle: Manage discount codes, simple and effective
about.aboutText: QCode is a Progressive Web App that helps you keep all your discount codes in one place. The app works completely offline and your data is stored locally on your device.
privacyPoints: All your data is stored locally
No data is shared with third parties
about.tutorialDescription: Take the app tour again to learn about all features.
about.footer: Built with ‚ù§Ô∏è using Next.js, TypeScript & Tailwind CSS

export.title: Export your discount codes
export.subtitle: Make a backup of all your discount codes. You can import this later or share with other devices.
export.tip: üí° Tip: Store your backup in a secure place like cloud storage.

import.title: Import discount codes
import.subtitle: Import discount codes from a backup file. This will replace all your current codes.
import.demoSubtitle: Load some examples to try out the app.
import.dangerSubtitle: This will permanently delete all your discount codes.

language.title: Change language

usage.noTimeData: No usage data available for the selected period

savings.startUsing: Start using your codes to track savings!
savings.tip1End: in unused codes waiting to save you money!
savings.tip2: Make sure to use codes before they expire to maximize your savings.
savings.tip3: Add more discount codes to increase your potential savings!

lifecycle.additionTrendPositive: You've added codes this month. Keep it up!
lifecycle.additionTrendNeutral: Consider adding more codes to maximize your savings opportunities.
lifecycle.expirationAlertWarning: codes expire soon. Use them before they're gone!
lifecycle.expirationAlertGood: No immediate expirations. Your codes are well managed!
lifecycle.lifespanTipWithData: Average code lifespan is days. Plan your usage accordingly.
lifecycle.lifespanTipNoData: Add expiry dates to your codes to better track their lifecycle.
lifecycle.noUpcomingExpirations: No codes expiring in the next 30 days

performance.goodUsage: Great! Most of your codes are active and ready to use.
performance.improveUsage: Consider using more of your codes to maximize savings.
performance.goodFavorites: You have a good balance of favorite codes for quick access.
performance.moreFavorites: Consider marking frequently used codes as favorites.

welcome.title: Welcome to QCode!
welcome.description: Let's take a quick tour of the app's main features. This tutorial will help you get the most out of managing your discount codes.

addCode.title: Adding Discount Codes
addCode.description: Start by clicking this button to add your first discount code. You can store the code, store name, discount amount, expiry date, and more.

searchFilter.title: Search & Filter
searchFilter.description: Use the search bar and filters to quickly find specific codes. You can search by store name, filter by category, or sort by different criteria.

categories.title: Categories & Favorites
categories.description: Organize your codes by categories and mark important ones as favorites for quick access. You can also archive codes you no longer need.

notifications.title: Notifications & Management
notifications.description: Click the bell icon in the header to view notifications about expiring codes. Use the gear icon to access settings, export/import, and other options.

completion.title: You're All Set!
completion.description: You've completed the tutorial! You can restart it anytime from the Settings menu. Now start adding your discount codes and never miss a deal!
